metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000501 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Awstats version 7.6 and earlier is vulnerable to a path traversal flaw in the handling of the "config" and "migrate" parameters resulting in unauthenticated remote code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000501` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

awstats - 7.4+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: awstats package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.4+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2').
